name: Find Your Brewery!
description: Lookibg for a place to drink? Well look no further. Using this app, you'll be able to search for bars near your area along with the weather as well.

name: Halloween Movie Night
description: Don't worry about planning your Halloween because we got that covered! With a movie and candy generator, you can generate whayou want to do that night. There is also a fun Halloween quiz that tests your knowledge on Halloween lore.
tech: HTML, CSS, mySQL, Heroku, Handlebars, Node

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Look up 5 day forecasts of cities that you type in.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Moment.js. OpenWeather API

name: Code Quiz
description: A timed quiz where your Javascript knowledge is tested!

name: Day Planner
description: An app that is used to schedule events by the hour.

name: Password Generator
description: Prompts are generated, asking what characters you want your password to be.

name: ReadMe Generator
description: App used to generate a readMe.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Application that allows you to add custom workouts and track them.
